projects.title: Maitri - Socio Doctor Booking System
projects.description: A full-fledged social media and appointment platform for mental health patients and doctors.
projects.longDescription: Developed an advanced telemedicine and consultation system with real-time chat, video consultations, Google Sign-In, and admin analytics dashboard. Integrated ZegoCloud for video calls, Razorpay for payments, and AWS EC2 for deployment.

projects.title: FStore - E-commerce Platform
projects.description: An e-commerce platform specializing in apparel with secure payments and order management.
projects.longDescription: Features include OTP authentication, cart management, discounts, order tracking, and admin dashboards. Integrated Razorpay for payments and deployed using AWS EC2 + NGINX + Route53.

projects.title: Portfolio Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Analytics system for tracking visitors, referrers, and performance metrics for portfolio websites.
projects.longDescription: Lightweight analytics tracking using Next.js API routes, JSON logs, and Chart.js. Displays visual metrics like visits, referrers, and engagement insights.

projects.title: Serverless Workflow Automation
projects.description: Automated backend workflows using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and YAML pipelines.
projects.longDescription: Built serverless event-driven functions using AWS Lambda with Python and Node.js to handle asynchronous data tasks. Configured CI/CD pipelines with YAML automation scripts.
